Contributor: Carey Print Litho, lithographer, printer.; United States Shipping Board Emergency Fleet Corporation, publisher.;
Note: Initial "D" with a "P" in it, appears on the right side of the illustration. Date based on America's participation in the war. Orientation: Horizontal.
Description: Illustration shows an American flag next to a U.S. Shipping Board pennant. Text says that the flag should be put next to the pennant. They both spell victory.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Publisher: Philadelphia, Pa. : bUnited States Shipping Board Emergency Fleet Corporation,

Title: Put the pennant beside the flag
